doc.repnme: Transcript of fifteenth special meeting of the Executive Directors of the Bank, held on Wednesday, September 13, 1950 : South Africa - Transport and Electricity Supply Commission (ESCOM) Projects
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors of the Bank held on Wednesday, September 13, 1950, covers only two proposed loans for the First Transport Project and the First Electricity Supply Commission (ESCOM) Project. The discussion touches on the general financial and economic position of South Africa as of 1950, especially the country's investment program, foreign exchange-earning capacity, and external debt situation.
